parameters.definition: Number of eggs required for a regular sandwich
Number of eggs required for a special sandwich
Number of slices of bacon required for a regular sandwich
Number of slices of bacon required for a special sandwich
Total number of slices of bacon available
Profit from selling a regular sandwich
Profit from selling a special sandwich

description: A breakfast joint makes two different sandwiches: a regular and a special. Both need eggs and bacon. Each regular sandwich requires \param{EggsReg} eggs and \param{BaconReg} slices of bacon. Each special sandwich requires \param{EggsSpec} eggs and \param{BaconSpec} slices of bacon. The joint has a total of \param{TotalEggs} eggs and \param{TotalBacon} slices of bacon. It makes a profit of \param{ProfitReg} per regular sandwich and a profit of \param{ProfitSpec} per special sandwich. How many of each sandwich should be made to maximize profit?
